pages.text: Millstones are a basic machine with a singular purpose: to crush materials into more fine-grained forms. Their top face functions like a hopper, and they can be powered with direct rotational power from below. Their sides act like a   Cogwheel.

$(l)Where there's a Mill, there's a May?$()$(br2)Millstones will toss particles out while working. You can input items from the world on top, or directly with a $(l:logistics)logistics$() block via any face. Processing time depends on speed. Right-click or use another logistics block to pull the item out.
